name: Trap Wars
description:
Welcome to Detroit....the real Detroit. Things may seem tough on TV, but it is nothing like experiencing it in person. Let me introduce you all to Snatchy. He used to be a crook and served the streets for years. He was the man and felt untouchable...until he wasn't.

Someone took what he loved most in this world. It's your job to help him clean the streets up. This...is the Trap War tour.
